title: `FocusManager` in Action
subtitle: Key methods for interacting with the focus tree.

leftBullets.title: `requestFocus(FocusNode node)`
leftBullets.description: The primary way to programmatically set focus to a specific node.

leftBullets.title: `primaryFocus` (getter)
leftBullets.description: Lets you find out which node in the entire application currently has focus.

leftBullets.title: `nextFocus()` / `previousFocus()`
leftBullets.description: Triggers traversal based on the active policy. This is what the system calls when you press Tab.

leftBullets.title: `applyFocusChanges()`
leftBullets.description: Forces the manager to process any pending focus changes immediately.
